location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Lieutenant William Vawdrey Glascott, Acting Pay Master at Keshme [Qeshm]

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of William Vawdrey Glascott's letter of 22 July, which enclosed a set of blank bills of exchange for 50,000 rupees. Dow states that the required amount has been shipped to Keshme [Qeshm] on the Honourable Company cruiser, the Vestal. Dow sends a bill of lading and a copy of the bills of exchange. The enclosures are not included with this letter.
